page.title: 07Windsurfing
page.content: My family hobby is windsurfing and we all go windsurfing at{Stonar Lake, Sandwich. The boards, made of {fibreglass}cost about Â£100 each. A windsurfer originated from a boat when an architect had an idea to make a craft lighter than a boat with the person on the craft{standing up.}But as the craft was so light there could not be a fixed mast. So that problem was solved by putting a bendy piece of rubber onto the bottom of the mast which was connected to a hole in the board, so when the man on the board let go of the boom the mast fell into the water. This craft was called a windsurfer because it is made mainly out of a surfboard and it uses wind to move it along. It does not really matter what clothing you wear but most people wear a{wetsuit.
